meanings.definition: The state or quality of being humble or modest.
meanings.sent1: Her lowliheads shone through as she quietly accepted the praise.
meanings.sent2: His lowliheads was evident in the way he never boasted about his achievements.
meanings.sent3: The lowliheads of the kitten made everyone smile at its adorable antics.
meanings.sent4: In a world of loud voices, her lowliheads was a beacon of calm.
meanings.sent5: The simplicity of his lowliheads made a lasting impression on all who met him.

meanings.definition: The act of behaving in a meek or submissive manner.
meanings.sent1: She showed her lowliheads by always yielding to others' opinions.
meanings.sent2: His lowliheads was mistaken for weakness by those who did not understand him.
meanings.sent3: The lowliheads of the puppy made it easy to train and teach new tricks.
meanings.sent4: In the face of adversity, her lowliheads was a source of strength and resilience.
meanings.sent5: The lowliheads of the tree branches bending in the wind was a sight to behold.
